description.value:
Heavenly radiance shines from an active celestial staff, a golden staff capped with a pair of sculpted angel's wings. Used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 greater striking holy staff. While wielding a celestial staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that have the evil trait and effects created by evil creatures. When you prepare this staff, if you're evil, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} until your next daily preparations.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Divine Lance] (good only)
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bless], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protection]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Everlight], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Inner Radiance Torrent]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Circle of Protection], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sanctified Ground]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Holy Cascade], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Inner Radiance Torrent]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spiritual Guardian], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Celestial]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Holy Cascade], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Celestial]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Angel Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Inner Radiance Torrent], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Celestial]

Craft Requirements You're good. Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
